english_translation: Awareness is the lamp of consciousness, the jewel of the inner being.
Life has a new roadmap from wisdom.

kannada_original: ಪೂರ್ಣ ಋತ ದರ್ಶನಕೆ ತಿಳಿವು ತರಣಿಯ ಕಿರಣ;
english_transliteration: Pūrṇa ṛta darśanake tiḷivu taraṇiya kiraṇa;
english_translation: For the vision of complete cosmic order (Ṛta), understanding is the ray of the sun (Tarani).
Live with intellectual power/wisdom – Dear Rāma.
